src_original: [DsP_56] tatra katamāni tathāgatasya dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni? yaduta

bhagavān supratiṣṭhitapādaḥ. tatrāyaṃ supratiṣṭhitapādaḥ:  sakalābhyāṃ pādatalābhyāṃ bhūmiṃ saṃspṛśati tadyathā karaṇḍatalaṃ samatalāvalambanāt  susama ādhāre 'vasthāpitaṃ sakalenādhastalena bhūmiṃ saṃspṛśaty evam eva bhagavān supratiṣṭhitapādaḥ;  bhagavān samantanemikaḥ. tatrāyaṃ samantanemikah:
tgt_original: 善現！ 一、世尊足下有平滿相，妙善安住猶如奩底，地雖高下隨足所蹈，皆悉坦然無不等觸今經當第三相。

src_original: adhastāt pādatalayoś cakre jāte sahasrāre sanabhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrake;
tgt_original: 二、世尊足下有千輻輪紋，網轂眾相無不圓滿四。

src_original: bhagavān mṛdutaruṇahastapādaḥ. tatreyaṃ mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā:  tadyathā śālmalikambalaṃ karpāsakambalaṃ vā,  yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;
tgt_original: 三、世尊手足皆悉柔軟，如覩羅綿，勝過一切八。

src_original: bhagavān dīrghāṅguliḥ. tatreyaṃ dīrghāṅgulitā:  tasya hastapādāṅgulayo 'tidīrghā,  yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;
tgt_original: 四、世尊手足二指中間，猶如鵝王咸有網鞔，金色交絡，文同綺畫六。

src_original: bhagavān jalahastapādah:  tasya hastapādayor jālāny avanaddhāni,
tgt_original: 五、世尊手足所有諸指，圓滿纖長甚可愛樂義當第二。

src_original: yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;  bhagavān āyatapārṣṇiḥ. tatrāyam āyatapārṣṇiḥ:  tasya pādapāṛṣnitale āyate,  yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;
tgt_original: 六、世尊足跟廣長圓滿，與趺相稱，勝餘有情七。

src_original: bhagavān ucchaṅkhapādaḥ. tatreyam ucchaṅkhapādatā:  āyatapārṣṇyā saṃprayoga āyatapārṣṇer gulphasya ca sandhir adṛśyatvena saṃyujyate,
tgt_original: 七、世尊足趺修高充滿，柔軟妙好，與跟相稱五。

src_original: yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;  bhagavān aiṇeyajaṅghaḥ. tatrāyam aiṇeyajaṅghaḥ:
tgt_original: 八、世尊雙腨漸次纖圓，如伊泥耶仙鹿王腨九。
